title: The best iPad cases for every type of person
text:
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships, so we get a share of the revenue from your purchase.

When you think of protecting gadgets with a case, you probably think of your phone first.

It's true that you should always keep your phone in a case, but you shouldn't leave your other tech products unprotected.

Below are our picks for the best iPad cases you can buy, based on price, added bulk, and style. Whether you use your iPad for work or play, you'll find an option that fits your lifestyle.
description: Whether you want a slim case, sleeve, or keyboard accessory, there is a perfect iPad case for everyone.
